title: non mi arriva la posta, ma sono sicura che mi dovrebbero arrivare delle email, perchè su gmail le ho
content:
da un paio di giorni Thunderbird non mi scarica la posta in arrivo, e non mi mette la posta eliminata nel cestino. Riesco a spedire le email, ma non me le salva.

Sono sicura che ho nuove email in arrivo, perchè su gmail ci sono.

Ho il mac.
creator: elenabagnoli

title: Hei, miksi  mozilla thunderbird ilmoittaa minulle, että saapuvan postin palvelin on jo käytössä, kun yritän importata tiliä
content: Siis miksi mozilla thunderbird ilmoittaa minulle, että saapuvan postin palvelin on jo käytössä, kun yritän importata uutta tiliä. MItä pitäisi tehdä, jotta saan tämän toisen tiin luotua thunderbirdiintilin.
creator: posti3

title: Email problems
content: Hello, 1. This is Sheila Herman again. I'm having problems with my other computer. I have two accounts: Harry's (herman.harry@twc.com) and mine (swherman@twc.com). When I tried to send an email, this message pops up: Login to server mail.twc.com with username swherman@twc.com failed, and I can't receive messages too! 2. There is only 1 Outgoing Server (SMTP) at the bottom of the left pane, and should there be 2? I would be grateful if someone could help me solve this annoying problem. Thank you so much and I look forward to hearing from you. Best regards, Sheila
creator: swherman

title: "Verdwenen" submap
content: Er verdween een submap uit mijn account doch ik vind deze terug in mijn profielmap onder "mappen.sbd" in imap.telenet-1.be. Hoe krijg ik deze terug zichtbaar in mijn email account?
creator: danyver

title: Thunderbird 128.11.1esr suddenly stopped displaying emails in the inboxes. Works in Troubleshoot Mode. Problem has occured again
content:
I thought this problem was resolved last month. Today, all my historic emails have disappeared but are visible in safe/troubleshoot mode.

I have done the following:

1) Disabled all extensions. 2)Themes are set to default. 3) force updates through Help - "About" .

It seems that all new emails are being shown in TB but all historic ones have diappeared except for in safe mode.


Please could someon help. Thank you so much
creator: jj.7

title: Starting LibreOffice
content: Question – When I startup LibreOffice in the morning I initially get the following screen (See attached). I select the application/file I want to open and I am off and running. How do I get back to this screen to open another application/file? I like the graphical interface. I understand I can open another application/file from the “File/Open” menu but I really like this graphical presentation when selecting my next file to open.
creator: rmosco77
